front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Medical Devices Communication Profile for Web Services

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Within the context of the ISO/IEEE 11073 family of standards for point-of-care (POC) 1 medical device communication (MDC), this standard defines a communication protocol specification for a distributed system of point-of-care (PoC) medical devices and medical IT systems that need to exchange data or safely control networked PoC medical devices by profiling Web service specifications and defining additional Web service specifications as part of this standard
